CustomField.formula:
IF (AND (RecordType.Name = "Partner Account", INCLUDES(Partner__r.Products__c, "Residential Loan"), INCLUDES(Partner__r.Products__c, "Community Solar")), "Residential Loan / Community Solar",
IF ( OR ( Name = "Co-Applicant Placeholder" , AND (RecordType.Name = "Partner Account", INCLUDES(Partner__r.Products__c, "Residential Loan")), Count_of_RL_Opportunities__c > 0),
"Residential Loan",
IF (OR( Count_of_CS_Opportunities__c > 0, AND (RecordType.Name = "Partner Account", INCLUDES(Partner__r.Products__c, "Community Solar")), RecordType.Name = "Parent Account" ),
"Community Solar",
"Not Defined")))
CustomField.label: Product Line
